name: Team Four Star RPG
description: Join Lanipator, Master Wugglez, and LordMoonStone. Also known as Nick, Grant and Kirran, as they venture through worlds based on games they once played.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) DirectX: Version 9.0
